detaileddescription.para: nfs4_op_getattr: Gets attributes for an entry in the FSAL.
Gets attributes for an entry in the FSAL.

parameterdescription.para: [INOUT] Pointer to the compound request's data

detaileddescription.para: nfs4_op_getattr_Free: frees what was allocared to handle nfs4_op_getattr.
Frees what was allocared to handle nfs4_op_getattr.
